meta.name: 藍調人 Bluesman
meta.about: SzeChai “Bluesman”, known by his Chinese stage name 藍調人 (Bluesman), hails from the vibrant city of Kowloon, Hong Kong. His musical journey weaves through the soulful tapestry of Canto-blues, where he wears multiple hats: singer, guitarist, and composer.

meta.name: 藍調人 Bluesman
meta.about: Canto-blues singer/guitarist/composer, from south of Boundary Street, Hong Kong.

meta.name: 藍調人
meta.about:
Kowloon Blues 藍調人 Bluesman
Canto-blues artist, from south side of Boundary Street, Hong Kong.
